models.srp_config module

Starlab Transformer Compression with SRP (Selectively Regularized Pruning)

Author: Hyojin Jeon (tarahjjeon@snu.ac.kr), Seoul National University

U Kang (ukang@snu.ac.kr), Seoul National University

Version : 1.0 Date : Nov 29, 2022 Main Contact: Hyojin Jeon

This software is free of charge under research purposes. For commercial purposes, please contact the authors. This code is mainly based on the [GitHub Repository] [GitHub Repository]: https://github.com/facebookresearch/fairseq

class models.srp_config.DecoderConfig(_name: str | None = None, embed_path: str | None = None, embed_dim: int | None = 512, ffn_embed_dim: int = 2048, layers: int = 6, attention_heads: int = 8, normalize_before: bool = False, learned_pos: bool = False, layerdrop: float = 0, layers_to_keep: List[int] | None = None, input_dim: int = '${model.decoder.embed_dim}', output_dim: int = '${model.decoder.embed_dim}')

class models.srp_config.SRPConfig(_name: str | None = None, activation_fn: Choices = 'relu', dropout: float = 0.1, attention_dropout: float = 0.0, activation_dropout: float = 0.0, adaptive_input: bool = False, encoder: EncDecBaseConfig = EncDecBaseConfig(_name=None, embed_path=None, embed_dim=512, ffn_embed_dim=2048, layers=6, attention_heads=8, normalize_before=False, learned_pos=False, layerdrop=0, layers_to_keep=None), max_source_positions: int = 1024, decoder: DecoderConfig = DecoderConfig(_name=None, embed_path=None, embed_dim=512, ffn_embed_dim=2048, layers=6, attention_heads=8, normalize_before=False, learned_pos=False, layerdrop=0, layers_to_keep=None, input_dim=512, output_dim=512), max_target_positions: int = 1024, share_decoder_input_output_embed: bool = False, share_all_embeddings: bool = False, no_token_positional_embeddings: bool = False, adaptive_softmax_cutoff: List[int] | None = None, adaptive_softmax_dropout: float = 0.0, adaptive_softmax_factor: float = 4, layernorm_embedding: bool = False, tie_adaptive_weights: bool = False, tie_adaptive_proj: bool = False, no_scale_embedding: bool = False, checkpoint_activations: bool = False, offload_activations: bool = False, no_cross_attention: bool = False, cross_self_attention: bool = False, quant_noise: QuantNoiseConfig = QuantNoiseConfig(_name=None, _pq=0.0, pq_block_size=8, scalar=0.0), min_params_to_wrap: int = 100000000, char_inputs: bool = False, relu_dropout: float = 0.0, base_layers: int | None = 0, base_sublayers: int | None = 1, base_shuffle: int | None = 1, export: bool = False, no_decoder_final_norm: bool = False, compression_rate: float = 0.2, use_kd: bool = False, pretrained_model: str = False, srp: bool = False, weighted_layernorm: bool = False, pruning_iter: int = 1, pruning_period: int = 15, decreasing: str = 'sa', warming_up: int = 0, pruning_stage: int = 0, attn_kd: float = 0.0, fc_kd: float = 0.0, emb_kd: float = 0.0, prob_kd: float = 0.7, _temp: float = 10)
